title: HOCHSTE® Flash Professional All Purpose Cleaner, Lemon Scent, Commercial Grade Multi-Surface Cleaning Solution, Heavy Duty Degreaser for Kitchens, Offices, Floors, Bathrooms, Industrial Use, 5L
features: COMMERCIAL STRENGTH CLEANING POWER: Flash Professional All Purpose Cleaner is engineered for professional environments where hygiene is non-negotiable. Its high-performance formula cuts through tough dirt, grease, and grime fast, making it ideal for kitchens, floors, and high-traffic areas. Trusted by cleaning professionals, it's the go-to choice for commercial settings demanding consistent, reliable results.

CONCENTRATED 5L VALUE SIZE: With a generous 5-litre container, Flash Professional offers excellent value and reduced refill frequency. Perfect for busy workplaces, schools, and industrial sites, this bulk size ensures you’re always stocked for daily cleaning needs. The concentrated formula means a little goes a long way just dilute as required or use neat for tough stains.

FRESH LEMON SCENT, NO LINGERING ODORS: Enjoy a fresh, clean-smelling space without overpowering chemical fragrances. Flash Professional features a light lemon scent that neutralises odours and leaves behind a pleasant, crisp aroma. It’s ideal for professional use where cleanliness should be noticeable, but not overbearing to staff or clients.

MULTI-SURFACE VERSATILITY: From tile floors to stainless steel countertops, Flash Professional is safe and effective on a wide range of surfaces. Use it to clean walls, floors, worktops, and kitchen appliances. Whether you’re wiping down a busy office kitchen or deep-cleaning industrial equipment, this cleaner gets the job done without damaging surfaces.

EASY TO USE & HIGHLY EFFECTIVE: Cleaning with Flash Professional is quick and hassle-free. For everyday messes, just dilute 50ml in 5 litres of water. For stubborn grime, apply directly and scrub. Its fast-acting surfactants go to work immediately, breaking down dirt and grease with minimal effort, saving you time and labour costs in commercial environments.
description: Product description Flash Professional Lemon Scent All Purpose Cleaner, 5L, is a powerful multi-surface cleaning solution designed for commercial and industrial use. Formulated with advanced surfactants and degreasers, it rapidly breaks down tough grease, grime, and stains on contact. Ideal for kitchens, bathrooms, offices, and floors, this concentrated cleaner delivers professional-grade results every time. The 5L bulk size provides long-lasting value, while the fresh lemon fragrance leaves your space smelling clean without harsh chemical odours. Safe for use on tiles, laminate, stainless steel, and more, it offers unmatched versatility in professional cleaning. Simply dilute for daily use or apply directly for deep cleaning jobs. Trusted by professionals across industries, Flash Professional ensures a hygienic environment with every use. Directions Store in cool and dry place Safety Warning Hazardous if ingested or handled by children. Store out of reach of children. See more
